show.subtitle: Your Economic Survival?  They're Not Looking Out For You.  We are.
show.title: The Wake Up Call

header.title: Poor? B-b-b-but The Government Says I’m Wealthy!

title: Poor? B-b-b-but The Government Says I’m Wealthy!
content:
Bought a house, did we? Oh, we must be wealthy, right? Uh, no, not if you had to borrow money. <!--more--> Healthcare’s The Best in the World in America, right?
Sorry.
Used to be.
No longer is.
America has the finest secondary education the world has to offer, yes?
‘Fraid not.
Other countries have caught up and their students will not be indentured servants for most of their professional lives.
Official lies, one after the other for your consumption.
America has chosen its own destiny.
You have to live with it.
The resurgence of crime during the ongoing economic collapse.
Violent crime up 15% last year.
Excerpt from John Whitehead’s new book, A Government of Wolves: The Emerging Police State” together with some examples of recent police brutality.
A few words on the ObamaCare insurance premiums.
The movie, “It’s A Wonderful Life”. 10 facts-and-figures: Only In America…
